system.description:
You have become the ruler of the battlefield,

the queen of combat, the king of tactics and strategy, and nothing will get in your way.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Warlord, you must earn the Fellowship of the Heir's people.

The Warlord starts with The Warrior's Path.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.warlord.Item.xFBwYUjGNzxntbCW]{THE WARRIOR'S PATH}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.warlord.Item.nF6wPyzI627IcKjx]{INVINCIBLE GENERAL}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.warlord.Item.fNS3RXRLXiRkAcJx]{OFF WITH THEIR HEAD}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.warlord.Item.BYgRGZKfC9A7LbAD]{THE FELLOWSHIP'S ARMIES}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.warlord.Item.hhMoAhuRSnnghMRD]{TO THE GATES OF HELL ITSELF}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.warlord.Item.R5OVhCXLJgOFQ1aW]{YOU WILL NOT DIE THIS DAY}

advancements.name: Take the Heir's Core Moves (Royal Treatment and Yes, My Liege). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
